Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'This is the Museum Estateâ€”the final station of Rail 11 of City 015. The Ascendant traces ended here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes. According to the records, this was an estate privately owned by a business magnate of the Transatlantic Economic Community, back in the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This person has a liking to collection, especially bionic machines. This museum of machines was once open for viewing even for normal citizens.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've heard of this before as well. Bionic research was one of the more well-developed fields back then, and various animal replications were made.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant! According to the worldwide viral density distribution mappings of the past years, this area has stayed in a low to medium degree of density for a long period of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And according to the scans just now, active Corrupted nearby are also scarce.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "So at least, this shouldn't be the enemy's nest.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'This Museum Estate has Anti-Punishing Virus measures built in since the Post-Pandemic Age, and has acted as a shelter facility until the end of the "Great Withdrawal".', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Though the viral density is lower here than in City 015, we've still been receiving distress signals from recon squads. The enemies here are not just the Corrupted...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ascendant powers are still an unknown factor, we must be careful.', 4: '1'}
